DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the controlling effect of atrovastatin on plasma lipid to achieve the category-specific targeted lipid levels.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use-Results Survey of Lipitor Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: To confirm the low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C)-lowering effect of 24 weeks of treatment with LipitorÂ®(Generic Name : atorvastatin calcium) Tablets and determine the rate of achievement of the category-specific target LDL-C level in patients with hypercholesterolemia; and to confirm the usefulness (efficacy and safety) of atorvastatin in patients who have not responded sufficiently to other statin therapies
DOC.criteria: Patients with hypercholesterolemia who have not achieved the categoryspecific target lipid level
